impact-statement: <ext-link ext-link-type="uri" xlink:href="http://Hippocampome.org">Hippocampome.org</ext-link> is an online resource that provides free human- and machine-readable access to the comprehensive property-based classification of hippocampal neurons from 14,000 pieces of published experimental evidence.
